meanings.definition: A strong piece of timber, metal, or other material set upright as a support or marker.
meanings.sent1: The fence was held up by sturdy posts.
meanings.sent2: She leaned against the wooden post to catch her breath.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel used the metal post as a lookout spot for acorns.
meanings.sent4: The post stood tall like a guardian watching over the garden.
meanings.sent5: The post was so thick, it seemed like it could withstand any storm.

meanings.definition: A position of employment or duty.
meanings.sent1: He applied for a post at the local bakery.
meanings.sent2: The manager offered her a post in the marketing department.
meanings.sent3: The post of chief taste tester for the ice cream company seemed like a dream job.
meanings.sent4: She took on the post of team captain with pride.
meanings.sent5: The post of mayor carried great responsibility in the small town.

meanings.definition: To display or publish something online.
meanings.sent1: She posts pictures of her cat on social media.
meanings.sent2: He posts updates about his travels on his blog.
meanings.sent3: The dog tried to post a selfie by pressing random buttons on the phone.
meanings.sent4: The artist posts their latest creations for the world to see.
meanings.sent5: Posting memories online helps keep them alive for years to come.
